general.title: General Irrigation Tips
general.tip1: Water early morning (6-10 AM) or late evening (6-8 PM) to reduce evaporation
general.tip2: Check soil moisture before watering - stick your finger 2 inches deep
general.tip3: Water deeply but less frequently to encourage root growth
general.tip4: Use mulch around plants to retain soil moisture
general.tip5: Avoid watering during windy conditions to prevent uneven distribution

efficiency.title: Water Efficiency
efficiency.tip1: Drip irrigation can save 30-50% more water than sprinkler systems
efficiency.tip2: Group plants with similar water needs together
efficiency.tip3: Install rain sensors to automatically skip irrigation during rainfall
efficiency.tip4: Regular maintenance of irrigation systems prevents water waste

seasonal.title: Seasonal Considerations
seasonal.tip1: Increase watering frequency during hot summer months
seasonal.tip2: Reduce watering in monsoon season and check weather forecasts
seasonal.tip3: Adjust watering schedules based on plant growth stages
